    • Method Detail

      • downloadAndCache

        public static File downloadAndCache(String type,
                    String identifier,
                    String url,
                    String serverMd5)
                             throws IOException
        Looks whether a specified file exists in the cache directory. Downloads it if it does not exists.
        Parameters:
        type - - Either splits or dataset
        identifier - - The name of the arff file to look up (or store)
        url - - Url to obtain it from
        serverMd5 - - Md5 hash of the file to be downloaded. Used for checking the local version, if it exists.
        Returns:
        A file pointer to the specified arff file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isDataDeclaration

        public static boolean isDataDeclaration(String line)
        Parameters:
        line - - Line from an Arff File.
        Returns:
        true if this is the line declaring the start of the data field (@DATA); false otherwise

      • isAttributeDeclaration

        public static boolean isAttributeDeclaration(String line)
        Parameters:
        line - - Line from an Arff File.
        Returns:
        true if this is the line declaring an attribute (@ATTRIBUTE); false otherwise

      • getAttributeName

        public static String getAttributeName(String attributeLine)
                               throws Exception
        Parameters:
        attributeLine - - Line declaring an attribute from an Arff File.
        Returns:
        The name of the attribute
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getNominalValues

        public static String[] getNominalValues(String attributeLine)
                                 throws Exception
        Parameters:
        attributeLine - - Line declaring a nominal attribute from an Arff File.
        Returns:
        The values of this nominal attribute
        Throws:
        Exception
